input.sentences: girls are having fun on their night out .
the two girls pose with the art drawing .
the girl has two drinks in her hands having fun .
the two girls with drinks at the bar .
the two men and female are having conversation in a vehicle backseat .
output.sentences: Last night, I got together at the bar with the girls.
We had much to talk about and lots of drawings to show each other.
Carly wished she had several hands for all the drinks she was carrying.
The girls sitting at the bar were enjoying the drinks Carly handed them.
The ride home in the vehicle, after we had drank a bit, was the most entertaining part of the night.
